thread.title: For Refugees, Tears and Relief
thread.title_full: For Refugees, Tears and Relief - WSJ

author: Miriam Jordan
title: For Refugees, Tears and Relief
text: Some of them got through Thursday just hours before the government had begun to enforce President Donald Trump’s Jan. 27 executive order that suspended the refugee resettlement program. Mr. Trump signed the executive order suspending immigration from seven predominantly Muslim countries—Iran, Iraq, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen—for at least 90 days, calling it a needed move to keep terrorists from entering the U.S. It also froze the entire U.S. refugee program for four months, barred Syrians from entering as refugees indefinitely and cut the number of refugees the U.S. will accept in fiscal year 2017 to...
